returns.bal_: if the user have any token

createAccount(string,address,string).details: Update the email of the user.

params._email: The new email of the user.

params._imageUrl: The image URL of the event.
params._nftUrl: the nft cid for the event;

getAllEvents().details: Get the details of all events.

returns._0: events_ The details of all events.

getAllTickets().details: Get the list of tickets purchased.

getEventById(uint32).details: Get the details of a specific event.

returns._0: An array of NFT token IDs.

getUser(address).details: Get the details of the user.

returns._0: An array of NFT token IDs owned by the user.

initialize(address,address,address).details: Initialize the contract with the initial owner.

params.initialOwner: The address of the initial owner.

isRegistered(address).details: Check if a user is registered.

returns._0: True if the user is registered, false otherwise.

mintNFTsForAttendees(uint32).details: This function can only be called after the registration period has ended and if the NFTs haven't been minted yet. Emits a `AttendeesNFTMinted` event for each minted NFT.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params._numberOfTickets: The number of tickets to purchase.
The number of tickets to refund.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateEventStatus(uint32).details: Update the status of the event based on the current time.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

withdrawEventFee(uint32).details: Withdraw event fees by the event creator.

getUserNFTs_(address).notice: Retrieves all NFT token IDs owned by a specific user.

mintNFTsForAttendees(uint32).notice: Mints NFTs for all attendees of a specific event.
